LFW Interview with... Malene Oddershede Bach

It is not often you talk to a hot new designer about mouse intestines and touching butterfly wings, but Nouse did just that when catching up with Malene Oddershede Bach

LFW Interview with... Carlotta Gherzi

Body con mixed with free flowing shapes, add in exceptional print work, it must be Carlotta Gherzi's latest collection (Thumbnail credit Photo credit: Emma Block)

LFW Interview with... Jungeun Lee

Fashion comes in all shapes and sizes. Jungeun Lee explains why her creations require no sewing or pattern cutting

LFW Interview with... Masc

Nouse looks behind the Masc and talks to the design duo on their latest collection.

Joanne Hynes spring/summer '12

Joanne Hynes presents a show of colour explosion and futuristic elements. (Thumbnail credit Philippa Grafton)

In Pictures: LFW Day Five

Highlights of London Fashion Week Day 5, as photographed by Philippa Grafton

Elisa Palomino spring/summer '12

Elisa Palomino creates victorian fairytales using lace, sequins and fishnet. (Thumbnail credit Philippa Grafton)

60 seconds with... Tommy Lloyd-Barker

Facepaint extraordinaire, Tommy Lloyd-Baker spends 60 seconds telling us why he paints his face. (Thumbnail credit Philippa Grafton)

A la Disposition spring/summer '12

A La Disposition construct their way to mechanical failure. (Thumbnail credit Philippa Grafton)

Fashion Shenzhen spring/summer '12

Oriental colour and patterns bring out the best of fashion at Fashion Shenzhen. (Thumbnail credit Philippa Grafton)

Christian Blanken spring/summer '12

Christian Blanken creates clothes with attitude in a presentation full of mirrors. (Thumbnail credit Philippa Grafton)

In Pictures: LFW Day Four

60 seconds with... Lynsie Roberts

Freelance photographer, Lynsie from Toronto, chats to us about British fashion.

60 seconds with... Victoria Cumming

Victoria Cumming is the PR Manager at Erickson Beamon, she tells us about her new collection in 60 seconds. (Thumbnail credit Philippa Grafton)

Ashley Isham spring/summer '12

Sparkles and gold set off Ashley Isham's spring/summer '12 collection (Thumbnail credit Ama Samra)

60 seconds with... Lolly Stockwell

Simone Rocha shows her first solo collection in London and we chat to her PR assistant about the pieces and her favourite outfits. (Thumbnail credit Philippa Grafton)

Ones to Watch spring/summer '12

Ones to Watch, although interesting, was perhaps more ones to avoid (Thumbnail credit Philippa Grafton)

Caroline Charles spring/summer '12

Caroline Charles dazzles her audience with smart summer suits and Indian influences.

In Pictures: LFW Day Three

Sunday at London Fashion Week (Thumbnail credit Image: Philippa Grafton)

60 seconds with... Tracy Rose

Hat designer, Tracy Rose, spends 60 seconds telling us about British fashion and her hats. (Thumbnail credit Image: Philippa Grafton)

Dans La Vie spring/summer '12

Dans La Vie's "My Pop Madonna" show was a creation of female fascination and empowerment. (Thumbnail credit Image: Philippa Grafton)

Esthetica spring/summer '12

Esthetica opens up a more challenging side to fashion, we meet some of the designers. (Thumbnail credit Image: Philippa Grafton)

60 seconds with... Iki Chan

Iki Chan works at Paperself selling beautifully designed false eyelashes, we speak to her for 60 seconds. (Thumbnail credit Image: Philippa Grafton)

LFW Interview with...Paul Gonzales

Nouse talks to a stylist heavy weight on his latest street style blog and many achievements in the fashion world. (Thumbnail credit Photograph by Paul Gonzales )

LFW Interview with... Ekaterina Kukhareva

Nouse interviews rising knitwear star, Ekaterina Kukhareva, on her latest collection titled 'Nature Vs Geometry'.

60 seconds with... Will Rowley

We chat to Will Rowley, BFC PR assistant about what he likes about London fashion.

In Pictures: LFW Day Two

As Day Two of LFW draws to a close, Philippa Grafton reminisces over the day though her snapshots of shows, celebs and shoots.
